name: ASPFitsReader
short_description:
Software package that includes various routines and tools allowing the user to reduce, process, and manipulate pulsar data, and create times-of-arrival compatible with tempo and tempo2 timing software.

Makefile included will have to be changed to point to appropriate directories/files for cfitsio, pgplot, etc.  Command-line interpreter clig must be installed in order to use ASPFitsReader, and as clig is open-source, it may be included with the ASPFitsReader distribution in the near future.

Until proper documentation is available, the -h option will provide useful instructions on how to use each routine.
summary: Package for processing pulsar data and creating times-of-arrival
